html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10612021-12-23,  ,  , 
ActCanada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act
SubjectLockdown Regions Designation Order (COVID-19)
PrecisRegulations amending the LOCKDOWN REGIONS DESIGNATION ORDER (COVID-19) in order to (1) specify the following ten (10) regions as lockdown regions for the period specified; and (2) allow workers who meet the eligibility requirements in these regions to receive lockdown benefits under the Canada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act for the period specified: (a) K’atl’odeeche (Northwest Territories [NWT]) from October 24, 2021 to November 20, 2021; (b) Behchokò (NWT) from October 24, 2021 to November 13, 2021; (c) Tuktoyaktuk (NWT) from November 7, 2021 to December 11, 2021; (d) Kuujjuaq (Quebec) from October 24, 2021 to December 18, 2021; (e) Aupaluk (Quebec) from November 7, 2021 to the Saturday of the week in which the lockdown measures cease to apply in the region; (f) Kangirsuk (Quebec) from October 24, 2021 to December 11, 2021; (g) Salluit (Quebec) from October 24, 2021 to the Saturday of the week in which the lockdown measures cease to apply in the region; (h) Akulivik (Quebec) from October 31, 2021 to the Saturday of the week in which the lockdown measures cease to apply in the region; (i) Tasiujaq (Quebec) from November 14, 2021 to December 11, 2021; and (j) Puvirnituq (Quebec) from November 28, 2021 to December 18, 2021.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0275 Publication Date: 2022-01-19
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Lockdown Regions Designation Order (COVID-19)
precis:
Regulations amending the LOCKDOWN REGIONS DESIGNATION ORDER (COVID-19) in order to (1) specify the following ten (10) regions as lockdown regions for the period specified; and (2) allow workers who meet the eligibility requirements in these regions to receive lockdown benefits under the Canada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act for the period specified:

(a) K’atl’odeeche (Northwest Territories [NWT]) from October 24, 2021 to November 20, 2021; (b) Behchokò (NWT) from October 24, 2021 to November 13, 2021; (c) Tuktoyaktuk (NWT) from November 7, 2021 to December 11, 2021; (d) Kuujjuaq (Quebec) from October 24, 2021 to December 18, 2021; (e) Aupaluk (Quebec) from November 7, 2021 to the Saturday of the week in which the lockdown measures cease to apply in the region; (f) Kangirsuk (Quebec) from October 24, 2021 to December 11, 2021; (g) Salluit (Quebec) from October 24, 2021 to the Saturday of the week in which the lockdown measures cease to apply in the region; (h) Akulivik (Quebec) from October 31, 2021 to the Saturday of the week in which the lockdown measures cease to apply in the region; (i) Tasiujaq (Quebec) from November 14, 2021 to December 11, 2021; and (j) Puvirnituq (Quebec) from November 28, 2021 to December 18, 2021.
